Reference

All functions

categorize()

Categorize recording data based on dates/times

get.wavs()

Get .wav Recording Metadata

getSunCalcs()

Get sunlight times for recording selection

mergelocations()

Merge location and recording data

remove.files()

Remove Recording Files

remove.selection()

Remove Selected Categories Per Location

saveselection()

Save recording selection data file to csv

setsox.exe()

Set location of sox.exe

sox.clip()

Clip wav to desired length

sox.clips()

Clip muliple wavs to desired length

sox.spectrogram()

Generate a spectrogram using SoX

sox.spectrograms()

Generate multiple spectrograms using SoX
